events.message: I received my order last week, but I want to return the product and get a refund because it does not meet my expectations.
The issue has been identified as a refund request based on the customer's message regarding product return and money back.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request case for this customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like to return your product and request a refund. I'd be happy to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you would like to return the product so we can process your refund efficiently?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product did not match the description on the website and was missing some key features I needed.
Thank you for the information. We will approve your return request and issue a full refund once we receive the item back. Please use the prepaid return label attached.
That sounds good, thank you for your prompt assistance. I will send the product back today using the label provided.
We have received the returned product and issued a full refund to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for it to appear on your statement.
Just following up to confirm that you have received the refund and ask if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
As you have confirmed receipt of the refund and no further assistance is needed, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
